title: Medieval-Themed Castle Escape
description: From dragons and knights to wizards and even kings and queens, Kryal Castle has it all. Enter this legendary land of myth and be captivated by a huge range of enchanting attractions as you’re transported back in time. Learn the art of fighting with swords and shields, witness a royal joust, enter the dragon's labyrinth, tour the torture chamber, or simply take in all your majestic surroundings with a one or two-night stay including a continental breakfast pack to kick start your day, welcome bottle of house white or red wine and a guaranteed late 11am checkout.

title: Five-Star Luxury Stay with À La Carte Breakfast & Spa Credit
description: Ballarat has shed its ‘old, cold and gold’ image to emerge as one of Victoria’s fastest growing getaway destinations with great food, wine and country charm. The latest jewel in the city's crown is The Provincial Hotel, Ballarat’s new five-star luxury boutique hotel. Enjoy a stylish getaway at this newly refurbished heritage property in Victoria’s Central Highlands. Old-world grandeur meets contemporary sophistication in this boutique hotel, enjoy daily à la carte breakfast, one entrée or dessert to share at the hotel's signature restaurant, Lola, a welcome cocktail each and two AU$25 spa credits to use at the nearby Sanctuary Day Spa included for two.

title: Five-Star Boutique Ballarat Stay
description:
Old-world splendour meets contemporary sophistication at the boutique Provincial Hotel, Ballarat’s playful five-star luxury hotel. Located in Victoria's Central Highlands, a 90-minute drive from Melbourne, Ballarat may just be Australia's grandest country town.

Re-opened in November 2018 after extensive refurbishment, this 1909 Victorian treasure and sparkling jewel in the city's crown offers impeccable design and first-class service. Boasting just 14 boutique suites, the Provincial marries antique furniture, artwork, vintage objects and beautiful textiles to create an alluring warmth throughout the property.

Delight in world-class facilities, including signature restaurant Lola - which offers a locally sourced, seasonally driven menu with a European influence - parking, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi and Apple TV in every room.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Share a complimentary cheese platter with someone special
- Pair your cheeses with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- Treat yourself to a sleep-in with a guaranteed 12pm checkout
offer_address: 121 Lydiard St N, Ballarat Central VIC 3350

title: Heritage Ballarat Apartments near City Centre with Lake Activities, Heated Pool & Spa
description: Strike gold with a retreat at Club Wyndham Ballarat, a heritage-listed mansion in the heart of Victoria's famous goldfields. Set within 55-acre grounds encompassing manicured gardens and a lake, this magnificent property is adorned with Victorian-era furnishings blending historic beauty and modern luxuries. Explore the area's vibrant dining scene and popular sites (including Sovereign Hill!) on one of the hotel's e-bikes and enjoy a friendly hit of tennis, finishing with a dip in the heated pool.

title: Restored Heritage Ballarat Beauty in 19th Century Mansion with Onsite Fine-Dining Restaurant
description: The grandeur of the Victorian era is alive and well in this beautifully restored heritage property in the heart of Ballarat. Across the modern-meets-antique collection of individually styled rooms decorated with breathtaking artworks, this boutique stay is a creative's dream - just a short walk from the Art Gallery of Ballarat. Relax for breakfast or sumptuous dinners in the light dappled Restaurant Babae where a seasonal menu introduces you to contemporary Australian cuisine.
offer_address: 710 Sturt Street, Ballarat Central, Victoria 3350, Australia
